document_title: Dry joints: Causes, treatment and prevention
subsection_content: Arthritis does not affect the patient's life. However, without early intervention, patients suffer many dangerous complications. Therefore, when symptoms last more than 1 week, you should quickly go to a reputable specialized medical facility to be examined and accurately determine the cause of dry joints, thereby providing early treatment and prevention. prevent complications.

kho khop.json. When to see a doctor?
Arthritis does not affect the patient's life. However, without early intervention, patients suffer many dangerous complications. Therefore, when symptoms last more than 1 week, you should quickly go to a reputable specialized medical facility to be examined and accurately determine the cause of dry joints, thereby providing early treatment and prevention. prevent complications.
